column1: tû is a Noldorin word meaning "muscle
Retaining the same form and meaning
column2: tû is commonly considered a valid Neo-Elvish word.
column4: http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/english.html Hiswelókës Sindarin Dictionary at http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/index.html Jrrvf.com (accessed 9 December 2011)Helge Fauskanger
